resources.string: There is no data to display at the moment. Confirm that you have PDF files in your download folder and try again. Thank you.
Something went wrong in accessing your PDF files. Please try again. Thank you.

The app needs storage access to function correctly. Without this, the app will not be able to get the PDF files on your device. If you wish to proceed, please click the Grant Permissions button. Otherwise close the app by clicking the Close button.
Storage permissions are needed for the app to function. Please enable them.
Write permissions are needed for the app to function. Please enable them.
Save current page as PDF file button
Your document has been exported successfully.
Processing your document now. Please wait.
Exporting your document has failed with the following error: %s.
